poems.title: Divine Light
poems.author: Mason Green
poems.excerpt: In the embrace of divine light, hearts find peace...
poems.full_text: In the embrace of divine light, hearts find peace. Wisdom's whispers, prayers in the wind, a journey of faith and enlightenment. Seek the sacred, for in spirituality's sanctuary, souls awaken.

poems.title: Path of Serenity
poems.author: Mia Anderson
poems.excerpt: In the path of serenity, harmony unfolds like petals in bloom...
poems.full_text: In the path of serenity, harmony unfolds like petals in bloom. Tranquil waters, mountain heights, a connection to the universe and the self. Embrace the journey, for in spiritual grace, true peace resides.
